verses.verse: וּכְהִתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> u-che-hit-pal-Lel had prayed עֶזְרָא֙ <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra Now when Ezra וּכְ֨הִתְוַדֹּת֔וֹ <S%H3034><s%> u-Che-hit-vad-do-To, and when he had confessed בֹּכֶה֙ <S%H1058><s%> bo-Cheh weeping וּמִתְנַפֵּ֔ל <S%H5307><s%> u-mit-nap-Pel, and casting himself down לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God נִקְבְּצוּ֩ <S%H6908><s%> nik-be-Tzu there assembled אֵלָ֨יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> mi-Yis-ra-'El unto him out of Israel קָהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> ka-Hal congregation רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- great מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, a very אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim of men וְנָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> ve-na-Shim and women וִֽילָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> vi-la-Dim, and children כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בָכ֥וּ <S%H1058><s%> va-Chu wept הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am for the people הַרְבֵּה־ <S%H7235><s%> har-beh- very בֶֽכֶה׃ <S%H1059><s%> Ve-cheh. sore ס sa-Mek

וַיַּעַן֩ <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'An answered שְׁכַנְיָ֨ה <S%H7935><s%> she-chan-Yah And Shechaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יְחִיאֵ֜ל <S%H3171><s%> ye-chi-'El of Jehiel מִבְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei [one] of the sons; עֹולָם 'o-lam כעֵילָם֙ <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam Elam קוַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said לְעֶזְרָ֔א <S%H5830><s%> le-'ez-Ra, unto Ezra אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we מָעַ֣לְנוּ <S%H4603><s%> ma-'Al-nu We have trespassed בֵאלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hei-nu, against our God וַנֹּ֛שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> van-No-shev and have taken נָשִׁ֥ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim wives נָכְרִיּ֖וֹת <S%H5237><s%> na-che-ri-Yot strange מֵעַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> me-'am-Mei of the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now יֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- yet now there is מִקְוֶ֥ה <S%H4723><s%> mik-Veh hope לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El in Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- spite זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> Zot. So

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now נִֽכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> nich-rot- Now therefore let us make בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit a covenant לֵ֠אלֹהֵינוּ <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-hei-nu with our God לְהוֹצִ֨יא <S%H3318><s%> le-ho-Tzi to put away כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all נָשִׁ֜ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim all the wives וְהַנּוֹלָ֤ד <S%H3205><s%> ve-han-no-Lad and such as are born מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem according בַּעֲצַ֣ת <S%H6098><s%> ba-'a-Tzat of them according to the counsel אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nai, master וְהַחֲרֵדִ֖ים <S%H2730><s%> ve-ha-cha-re-Dim and of those that tremble בְּמִצְוַ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> be-mitz-Vat at the commandment אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; of our God וְכַתּוֹרָ֖ה <S%H8451><s%> ve-chat-to-Rah according to the law יֵעָשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh. and let it be done

ק֛וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum Arise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עָלֶ֥יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha is your responsibility הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var for [this] matter וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu ourselves עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach; will be with חֲזַ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> cha-Zak [belongeth] unto thee we also [will be] with thee be of good courage וַעֲשֵֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-Seh. and do פ Peh

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom Then arose עֶזְרָ֡א <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra Ezra וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> vai-yash-Ba' to swear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׂרֵי֩ <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei and made the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim the Levites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, and all Israel לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot that they should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kad-da-Var according to this word הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh to this וַיִּשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-sha-Ve-'u. And they sware

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom rose up עֶזְרָ֗א <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra, Then Ezra מִלִּפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei from before בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into לִשְׁכַּ֖ת <S%H3957><s%> lish-Kat into the chamber יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3076><s%> ye-ho-cha-Nan of Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֶלְיָשִׁ֑יב <S%H475><s%> 'el-ya-Shiv; of Eliashib וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there לֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem no bread לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor אָכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal thither he did eat וּמַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> u-Ma-yim water לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor שָׁתָ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> sha-Tah, nor drink כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מִתְאַבֵּ֖ל <S%H56><s%> mit-'ab-Bel for he mourned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over מַ֥עַל <S%H4604><s%> Ma-'al because of the transgression הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> hag-go-Lah. of them that had been carried away ס sa-Mek

וַיַּעֲבִ֨ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vi-ru made ק֜וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol A proclamation בִּיהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah throughout Judah וִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> vi-ru-sha-Lim, and Jerusalem לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol to all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto all the children הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> hag-go-Lah, of the captivity לְהִקָּבֵ֖ץ <S%H6908><s%> le-hik-ka-Vetz that they should gather themselves together יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. unto Jerusalem

וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָב֜וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo And that whosoever would not come לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> lish-Lo-shet within three הַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim, days כַּעֲצַ֤ת <S%H6098><s%> ka-'a-Tzat according to the counsel הַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> has-sa-Rim of the princes וְהַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> ve-haz-ze-ke-Nim, and the elders יָחֳרַ֖ם <S%H2763><s%> yo-cho-Ram should be forfeited כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all רְכוּשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7399><s%> re-chu-Sho; all his substance וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu himself יִבָּדֵ֖ל <S%H914><s%> yib-ba-Del and himself separated מִקְּהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> mik-ke-Hal from the congregation הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> hag-go-Lah. of those that had been carried away ס sa-Mek

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-ka-ve-Tzu gathered themselves together כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H376><s%> 'an-shei- the men יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֨ן׀ <S%H1144><s%> u-vin-ya-Min and Benjamin יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim unto Jerusalem לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> lish-Lo-shet within three הַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim, days ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he חֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> Cho-desh month הַתְּשִׁיעִ֖י <S%H8671><s%> hat-te-shi-'I It [was] the ninth בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> be-'es-Rim on the twentieth בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh; [day] of the month וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu sat כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, and all the people בִּרְחוֹב֙ <S%H7339><s%> bir-chOv in the street בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God מַרְעִידִ֥ים <S%H7460><s%> mar-'i-Dim trembling עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var because of [this] matter וּמֵהַגְּשָׁמִֽים׃ <S%H1653><s%> u-me-hag-ge-sha-Mim. and for the great rain פ Peh

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom stood up עֶזְרָ֤א <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra And Ezra הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, about אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem You מְעַלְתֶּ֔ם <S%H4603><s%> me-'al-Tem, unto them Ye have transgressed וַתֹּשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H3427><s%> vat-to-Shi-vu and have taken נָשִׁ֣ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim wives נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <S%H5237><s%> na-che-ri-Yot; strange לְהוֹסִ֖יף <S%H3254><s%> le-ho-Sif to increase עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto אַשְׁמַ֥ת <S%H819><s%> 'ash-Mat the trespass יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now תְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> te-Nu Now therefore make תוֹדָ֛ה <S%H8426><s%> to-Dah confession לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei- God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-tei-Chem of your fathers וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-Su and do רְצוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H7522><s%> re-tzo-No; his pleasure וְהִבָּֽדְלוּ֙ <S%H914><s%> ve-hib-ba-de-Lu and separate מֵעַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> me-'am-Mei yourselves from the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> han-na-Shim wives הַנָּכְרִיּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5237><s%> han-na-che-ri-Yot. and from the strange

וַיַּֽעְנ֧וּ <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya'-Nu answered כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הַקָּהָ֛ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal Then all the congregation וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol voice גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol; with a loud כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that; כְּדִבְרֶיךָ ke-div-rei-cha ככִּדְבָרְךָ֥ <S%H1697><s%> kid-va-re-Cha act קעָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu is our duty לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot. so must we do

אֲבָ֞ל <S%H61><s%> 'a-Val But הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people רָב֙ <S%H7227><s%> rav [are] many וְהָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ve-ha-'Et and [it is] a time גְּשָׁמִ֔ים <S%H1653><s%> ge-sha-Mim, of much rain וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein are not כֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach and we are not able לַעֲמ֣וֹד <S%H5975><s%> la-'a-Mod to stand בַּח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> ba-Chutz; without וְהַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> ve-ham-me-la-Chah, neither [is this] a work לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor לְי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> le-Yom day אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad of one וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor לִשְׁנַ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> lish-Na-yim, or two כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הִרְבִּ֥ינוּ <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bi-nu for we are many לִפְשֹׁ֖עַ <S%H6586><s%> lif-Sho-a' that have transgressed בַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> bad-da-Var in this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this
